thread.title: Oren Leib joins LexInsight as Vice President of Growth & Partnerships

author: cnbc.com
title: Oren Leib joins LexInsight as Vice President of Growth & Partnerships
text:
SAN JOSE, Calif., April 03, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- LexInsight, the world’s first digital, AI-driven marketplace that provides in-house counsel and large law firms with a direct and reliable source of experienced contract legal professionals, is proud to announce the appointment of Oren Leib as its new Vice President of Growth and Partnership.
Joining LexInsight in March 2018, Oren’s years of commercial success in building LegalTech businesses will be instrumental to our growth as a young and innovative company. As the newly appointed VP of Growth & Partnerships, he will spearhead our sales strategy to ensure that more law firms, corporates, and banks can leverage top legal talent on demand.
“Oren’s wealth of experience in legal industry sales as well as his extensive insight into the operational needs of large law firms will be valuable in helping prospective LexInsight clients get more reliable, efficient legal professional staffing,” says Abhi Verma, CEO and founder of LexInsight. “We’re excited to see the growth of strong client relationships and increased market share with Oren leading the way.”
Oren brings a unique combination of business and legal knowledge to LexInsight. His award-winning approach to promoting innovative product solutions is driven by a deep understanding of legal operations, the business of law, and new and emerging client use cases and trends across the legal sector.
Oren received his B.A. as well as his J.D. from Rutgers University. Recognized as a legal innovation thought leader, he began his career as an IP transactions attorney before moving into key sales & strategy leadership roles within Thomson Reuters, Axiom, and LawGeex. His tenure in the industry includes building world class sales organizations and relentlessly pursuing innovative customer solutions for new and emerging trends.
About LexInsight
Founded in 2016 by Abhi Verma, who is also the CEO of LexInnova, LexInsight pioneered the first international marketplace for on-demand contract legal professionals. By using technology to speed the selection, hiring, and payment of contract legal professionals, LexInsight gives clients direct access to the talent they need and matches them with the right contractors in minutes.
Email: team@lexinsight.com Phone number: 857-246-9999
Source: LexInsight
